ygData.subject: Re: Dark pact question for all Magic Users
ygData.msgSnippet: mainly because of the underlying philosophy of how necro spells work- for example there are many of our spells that take from our lifeforce to bring about an
ygData.messageBody:
mainly because of the underlying philosophy of how necro spells work- for
example there are many of our spells that take from our lifeforce to bring
about an effect, like dark empathy where we heal others wounds but draw from
our health. we are the dark side of magic, and have certain advantages
because of it. however, we are shunned and hated for this power, so there
is a trade off.

belphenor
lodge of the dead
neriak, fennin ro


>From: "Marziani, Michael D." <Michael.Marziani@...>
>
>I have seen a lot about dark pact. This spell is very cool, but I question
>why only the Necro has this ability. In many games I have seen all kinds
>of
>magic user classes with the ability to sacrifice hp to gain mana. Does
>anyone have the background understanding of why this ability might be necro
>only?
>
>Thanks for the info.
>
>-Solric
